adm:package.name: org.opends.server.admin.std
adm:package.adm:synopsis: Core OpenDS Directory Server administrative components.

adm:property.name: listen-port
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Specifies the port number on which the
will listen for connections from clients.
adm:property.adm:description: Only a single port number may be provided.

adm:property.name: use-ssl
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Indicates whether the
should use SSL.
adm:property.adm:description:
If enabled, the
will use SSL to encrypt communication with the clients.

adm:property.name: ssl-cert-nickname
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Specifies the nickname (also called the alias) of the certificate that the
should use when performing SSL communication.
adm:property.adm:description:
This is only applicable when the
is configured to use SSL.

adm:property.name: key-store-pin
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Specifies the clear-text PIN needed to access the
.
adm:property.adm:description: Changes to this configuration attribute will take effect the next time that the key manager is accessed.

adm:property.name: key-store-pin-property
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Specifies the name of the Java property that contains the clear-text PIN needed to access the
.
adm:property.adm:description: Changes to this configuration attribute will take effect the next time that the key manager is accessed.

adm:property.name: key-store-pin-environment-variable
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Specifies the name of the environment variable that contains the clear-text PIN needed to access the
.
adm:property.adm:description: Changes to this configuration attribute will take effect the next time that the key manager is accessed.

adm:property.name: key-store-pin-file
adm:property.adm:TODO: Should use a file-based property definition?
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Specifies the path to the text file whose only contents should be a single line containing the clear-text PIN needed to access the
.
adm:property.adm:description: Changes to this configuration attribute will take effect the next time that the key manager is accessed.

adm:property.name: key-manager-provider-dn
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Specifies the DN of the configuration entry for the key manager provider that should be used with this
.
adm:property.adm:description: Changes to this attribute will take effect immediately, but only for subsequent attempts to access the key manager provider for associated client connections.

adm:property.name: trust-manager-provider-dn
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Specifies the DN of the configuration entry for the trust manager provider that should be used with this
.
adm:property.adm:description: Changes to this attribute will take effect immediately, but only for subsequent attempts to access the trust manager provider for associated client connections.

adm:property.name: include-filter
adm:property.adm:synopsis: The set of filters that define the entries that should be included in the cache.

adm:property.name: exclude-filter
adm:property.adm:synopsis: The set of filters that define the entries that should be excluded from the cache.
